bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with zhong shu 中暑 , struck by summerheat. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 23: 夫熱暍 不可得冷，得冷便死，此謂外卒以冷觸其熱，蘊積於內，不得宣發故也 , “A heat stroke must not be met with cold. If met with cold, [the patient] will die. This is explained as a sudden clash of the heat with cold. This will lead to an accumulation inside because [the qi] will be unable to move on and effuse”. Re yi 熱翳 , heat shade [2]

Alternative Names mu zhong re mo 目中熱膜 , heat membrane in the eyes. Pathological Condition of mu yi 目翳 , eye shade, which is a heat condition. It is accompanied by red eyes that ache and feel hot. Ben cao shi yi 本草拾遺 Substance Entry ying yu 蘡薁 : （藤汁）滴目中，去熱 翳赤障 , “[The juice from the vine] is to be dripped into the eyes to remove heat shades and red screens”.
